original: Adbhutadharmaparyāya
analyzed: adbhuta dharmaparyāya

original: [0] evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāse.
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati sma veṇuvane kalandaka nivāse

original: [1] athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat.
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya rājagṛham piṇḍāya prāvikṣat

original: adrākṣīd āyuṣmān ānando rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāṇo 'nyatamasmin pradeśe
analyzed: adrākṣīt āyuṣmān ānandaḥ rājagṛhe nagare sa avadānam piṇḍāya caramāṇaḥ nyatamasmin pradeśe

original: kūṭāgāram aśītidvāram ulliptāvaliptam ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpam.
analyzed: kūṭāgāram aśīti dvāram ullipta avaliptam ucchṛta dhvaja patākam āmukta paṭṭa dāma kalāpam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tasyaitad abhavat. yaḥ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca punar tasya etat abhavat yaḥ kaścid śrāddhaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā

original: īdṛśaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kārayitvā caturdiśe bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhatḥ
analyzed: īdṛśam kūṭāgāram kārayitvā caturdiśe bhikṣu saṃghe niryātayet yaḥ vā tathāgatasya arhatḥ

original: samyaksaṃbuddhasyāmalakapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhasya āmalaka pramāṇam stūpam pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcī mātrām yaṣṭim āropayet

original: badarīpatramātraṃ cchatraṃ yavaphalapramāṇāṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ
analyzed: badarī patra mātram chatram yava phala pramāṇām pratimām kārayet sarṣa phala pramāṇam

original: dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tat katamaṃ tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ syāt?
analyzed: dhātum pratiṣṭhāpayet tat katamam tatas prabhūtataram puṇyam syāt

original: athāyuṣmata ānandasyaitad abhavat. śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugato me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ.
analyzed: atha āyuṣmataḥ ānandasya etat abhavat śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugataḥ me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ

original: yaṇv aham etam evārthaṃ bhagavata ārocayeyaṃ yathā me sa bhagavāṃ vyākariṣyati tathāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīty.
analyzed: aham etam eva artham bhagavate ārocayeyam yathā me sa bhagavān vyākariṣyati tathā aham dhārayiṣyāmi iti

original: [2] athāyuṣmān ānando rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtya paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān ānandaḥ rājagṛhe nagare sa avadānam piṇḍāya caritvā kṛta bhakta kṛtya paścāt bhakta piṇḍapāta pratikrāntaḥ

original: pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya
analyzed: pātra cīvaram pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavān tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya

original: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt. ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam
analyzed: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte sthāt ekānta sthitaḥ āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavantam

original: idam avocat. ihāhaṃ bhadanta pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya
analyzed: idam avocat iha aham bhadanta pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra cīvaram ādāya rājagṛham piṇḍāya

original: prāvikṣaṃ. so 'ham adrākṣam rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāṇo 'nyatamasmin
analyzed: prāvikṣam saḥ ham adrākṣam rājagṛhe nagare sa avadānam piṇḍāya caramāṇaḥ nyatamasmin

original: pradeśe kūṭāgāram aśītidvāram ulliptāvaliptam ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaṃ
analyzed: pradeśe kūṭāgāram aśīti dvāram ullipta avaliptam ucchṛta dhvaja patākam āmukta paṭṭa dāma kalāpam

original: ca dṛṣṭvā ca punar me etad abhavat. yaḥ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
analyzed: ca dṛṣṭvā ca punar me etat abhavat yaḥ kaścid śrāddhaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā

original: vā īdṛśaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ caturdiśe bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhatḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
analyzed: vā īdṛśam kūṭāgāram caturdiśe bhikṣu saṃghe niryātayet yaḥ vā tathāgatasya arhatḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya

original: parinirvṛtasya mṛttikāpiṇḍād āmalakapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim
analyzed: parinirvṛtasya mṛttikā piṇḍāt āmalaka pramāṇam stūpam pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcī mātrām yaṣṭim

original: āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchatraṃ yavaphalapramāṇāṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ
analyzed: āropayet badarī patra mātram chatram yava phala pramāṇām pratimām kārayet sarṣa phala pramāṇam

original: dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tat katamaṃ tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ syāt?
analyzed: dhātum pratiṣṭhāpayet tat katamam tatas prabhūtataram puṇyam syāt

original: tasya mamaitad abhavat. śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugato me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ. yanv aham etam evārthaṃ bhagavata ārocayeyaṃ yathā bhagavāṃ vyākariṣyati  #
analyzed: tasya mama etat abhavat śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugataḥ me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ yanu aham etam eva artham bhagavate ārocayeyam yathā bhagavān vyākariṣyati  /

original: tathāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīty.
analyzed: tathā aham dhārayiṣyāmi iti

original: [3] evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānanda,
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānanda

original: idam avocat. sādhu sādhv ānanda bahujanahitāya tvam ānanda pratipanno ca bahujanasukhāya
analyzed: idam avocat sādhu sādhu ānanda bahu jana hitāya tvam ānanda ca bahu jana sukhāya

original: lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ yas tvaṃ tathāgatam etam evārthaṃ
analyzed: loka anukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya deva manuṣyāṇām yaḥ tvam tathāgatam etam eva artham

original: paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase. tena hy ānanda śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru,
analyzed: paripraṣṭavyam manyase tena hi ānanda śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru

original: bhāṣiṣye. jambūdvīpo hy ānanda dvīpaḥ saptayojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa uttaraviśālo
analyzed: bhāṣiṣye jambūdvīpaḥ hi ānanda dvīpaḥ sapta yojana sahasrāṇi āyāma vistāreṇa

original: dakṣiṇena śakaṭāmukhaḥ tam enam kāscic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ
analyzed: dakṣiṇena śakaṭāmukhaḥ tam enam kāscid śrāddhaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā sapta ratna mayam

original: kṛtvā srotāpannebhyaḥ sakṛdāgāmibhyo 'nāgāmibhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaś cāturdiśe
analyzed: kṛtvā srotāpannebhyaḥ sakṛdāgāmibhyaḥ nāgāmibhyaḥ rhadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ cāturdiśe

original: vā bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayet. yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya
analyzed: vā bhkiṣu saṃghe niryātayet yaḥ vā tathāgatasya arhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya

original: mṛttikāpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ vā yaṣṭim āropayet
analyzed: mṛttikā piṇḍāt āmalaka phala pramāṇam stūpam pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcī mātrām vā yaṣṭim āropayet

original: badarīpatramātracchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet,
analyzed: badarī patra mātra chattram yava phala pramāṇam pratimām kārayet sarṣa phala pramāṇam dhātum pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
analyzed: idam eva ānanda tatas prabhūtataram puṇyam vadāmi

original: [4] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. asty ānanda pūrvavideho nāma dvīpo 'ṣṭauyojanasahasrāṇy
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu ānanda jambūdvīpaḥ dvīpaḥ asti ānanda pūrvavidehaḥ nāma dvīpaḥ ṣṭau yojana sahasrāṇi

original: āyāmavistāreṇa samantād ardhacandrākārapariṇāmitaḥ. tam enaṃ kaścit śrāddhaḥ kulaputro
analyzed: āyāma vistāreṇa samantāt ardhacandra ākāra pariṇāmitaḥ tam enam kaścid śrāddhaḥ kula putraḥ

original: vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayet yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ
analyzed: vā kula duhitā vā sapta ratna mayam kṛtvā cāturdiśe bhkiṣu saṃghe niryātayet yaḥ vā tathāgatasya arhataḥ

original: samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet
analyzed: samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛd piṇḍāt āmalaka phala pramāṇam stūpam pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ
analyzed: sūcī mātrām yaṣṭim āropayet badarī patra mātram chattram yava phala pramāṇam pratimām

original: kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
analyzed: kārayet sarṣaphala pramāṇam dhātum pratiṣṭhāpayet idam eva ānanda tatas bahutaram puṇyam vadāmi

original: [5] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. asty ānandāvaragodānīyo nāma dvīpo navayojanasahasrāṇy
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu ānanda jambūdvīpaḥ dvīpaḥ asti ānandāvaragodānīyaḥ nāma dvīpaḥ nava yojana sahasrāṇi

original: āyāmavistāreṇa samantāt pūrṇacandrākārapariṇāmitaḥ. tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro
analyzed: āyāma vistāreṇa samantāt pūrṇa candra ākāra pariṇāmitaḥ tam enam kaścid śrāddhaḥ kula putraḥ

original: vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā yāvac cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo
analyzed: vā kula duhitā vā sapta ratna mayam kṛtvā yāvat cāturdiśe bhkiṣu saṃghe niryātayet

original: vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ

analyzed: stūpam pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcī mātrām yaṣṭim āropayet badarī patra mātram chattram yava phala pramāṇam

original: pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
analyzed: pratimām kārayet sarṣaphala pramāṇam dhātum pratiṣṭhāpayet idam eva ānanda tatas prabhūtataram puṇyam vadāmi

original: [6] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu ānanda jambūdvīpaḥ dvīpaḥ tiṣṭhatu pūrvavidehaḥ dvīpaḥ tiṣṭhatu avaragodānīyaḥ

analyzed: dvīpaḥ asti ānanda uttarakuruḥ nāma dvīpaḥ daśa yojana sahasrāṇi āyāma vistāreṇa samantāt

original: samantacaturasraḥ. tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ
analyzed: samanta catur asraḥ tam enam kaścid śrāddhaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā sapta ratna mayam

analyzed: āropayet badarī patra mātram chattram yava phala pramāṇam pratimām kārayet sarṣa phala pramāṇam

original: dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
analyzed: dhātum pratiṣṭhāpayet tatas prabhūtataram puṇyam vadāmi

original: [7] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpas. tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu ānanda jambūdvīpaḥ dvīpaḥ tiṣṭhatu pūrvavidehaḥ dvīpaḥ tiṣṭhatu avaragodānīyaḥ

analyzed: dvīpaḥ tiṣṭhatu uttarakuru dvīpaḥ asti ānanda śakrasya devānām indrasya vaijayanto

analyzed: nāma prāsādaḥ tam enam kaścid śrāddhaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā sapta ratna mayam

analyzed: parinirvṛttasya mṛd piṇḍāt āmalaka phala pramāṇam stūpam pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcī mātrām yaṣṭim

original: āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ
analyzed: āropayet badarī patra mātram chattram yava phala pramāṇam pratimām kārayet sarṣa phala pramāṇam

original: dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
analyzed: dhātum pratiṣṭhāpayet idam eva ānanda tatas prabhūtataram puṇyam vadāmi

original: [8] tiṣṭhatv ānanda jambūdvīpo dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo
analyzed: tiṣṭhatu ānanda jambūdvīpaḥ dvīpaḥ tiṣṭhatu pūrvavidehaḥ dvīpaḥ tiṣṭhatu avaragodānīyaḥ

original: dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatūttarakuru dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatu śakrasya devānām indrasya vaijayantaḥ
analyzed: dvīpaḥ tiṣṭhatu uttarakuru dvīpaḥ tiṣṭhatu śakrasya devānām indrasya vaijayantaḥ

original: prāsādaḥ. asty ānanda trisāharsamahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ. tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ
analyzed: prāsādaḥ asti ānanda tri sāharsa mahā sāhasraḥ lokadhātuḥ tam enam kaścid śrāddhaḥ

original: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā srotāpannebhyaḥ sakṛdāgāmibhyo 'nāgāmibhyo

analyzed: rhadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ yāvat cāturdiśe vā bhkiṣu saṃghe niryātayet yaḥ vā tathāgatasya arhataḥ

original: samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet
analyzed: samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛd piṇḍāt āmalaka phala pramāṇam stūpam pratiṣṭhāpayet

original: sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ

original: kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
analyzed: kārayet sarṣaphala pramāṇam dhātum pratiṣṭhāpayet idam eva ānanda tatas prabhūtataram puṇyam vadāmi

original: [9] tat kasya hetoḥ. aprameyo hy ānanda tathāgato dānenāprameyaḥ śīlenāprameyaḥ kṣāntyāprameyo
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ aprameyaḥ hi ānanda tathāgataḥ dānena aprameyaḥ śīlena aprameyaḥ kṣāntyā aprameyaḥ

original: vīryeṇāprameyo tyāgenāprameyo maitryāprameyaḥ karuṇayāprameyo muditayāprameya upekṣayā
analyzed: vīryeṇa aprameyaḥ tyāgena aprameyaḥ maitryā aprameyaḥ karuṇayā aprameyaḥ muditayā aprameyaḥ upekṣayā

original: caturbhir vaiśāradyais daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair
analyzed: caturbhiḥ vaiśāradyaiḥ daśabhiḥ tathāgata balaiḥ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ āveṇikaiḥ buddha dharmaiḥ

original: aprameyāprameyaguṇasamanvāgato hy ānanda tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
analyzed: aprameya aprameya guṇa samanvāgataḥ hi ānanda tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ

original: [10] evam ukto āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat:
analyzed: evam uktaḥ āyuṣmān ānandaḥ bhagavantam idam avocat

original: āścaryaṃ bhagavann āścaryaṃ sugata yāvad ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ. ko nāmāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ.
analyzed: āścaryam bhagavan āścaryam sugata yāvat ayam dharmaparyāyaḥ kaḥ nāma ayam dharmaparyāyaḥ

original: kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi. tasmāt tarhi tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyam adbhutam adbhutadharmaparyāyaṃ
analyzed: katham ca enam dhārayāmi tasmāt tarhi tvam ānanda imam dharmaparyāyam adbhutam adbhuta dharmaparyāyam

original: iti dhāraya. idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te bhikṣava āyuṣmāṃś cānando bhagavato
analyzed: iti dhārayaḥ idam avocat bhagavān ātta manāḥ te bhikṣavaḥ āyuṣmān ca ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ

original: bhāṣitam abhyanandan.
analyzed: bhāṣitam abhyanandan
